Who are we ?
================

**HostShield.net** (Hostshield LTD) has been providing hosting solutions for the past 2 years. When Hostshield LTD started, the market was pretty saturated, we had lots of competitors providing the same services that we do.
Hostshield started thinking of a way to compete and prove itself in the market, so we started providing cheap vps (virtual private servers) and offering payment solutions that other companies did not offer. Our sales started increasing which made us grow rapidly within just few months. Customers were extremely happy and really liked our support given after sales, they also liked the way our services are activated instantly after payment. In 2019 we started offering dedicated servers due to the demand of our customers which was also greeted by a lot of sales. We are now still expanding and trying to offer our customers deals that they can never find on other sites. Our top priority is our customers because without them we wouldn’t have been here. We thank each one of you for trusting us and for using our services and we are looking to expand more with your help. Hostshield LTD will always provide high performance servers for the best prices and the best support.
